name: cursorflow-monorepo
description: CursorFlow - PRD-to-Code platform combining Cursor IDE with v0 Platform API

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mcp"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:mcp
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:mcp
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:mcp
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../packages/nw-mcp && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules packages/nw-mcp/node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build

author: CursorFlow Team
